Name: Circle Brawl
About the game: This is the 2D version of Warlock Brawl - the classic arena map in Warcraft III 2D view for more precise operation Let's review the essence of Warlock Brawl: --------------------------------------------- Attack enemy warlocks into the lava range to quickly destroy them. Inflicting damage to an enemy warlock can accumulate damage points. The higher the damage point, the farther the attack distance caused by attacking the enemy warlock. You can continue to purchase skills or equipment after each turn. Highly customizable game parameters. A variety of different game modes. Each combination of unique skills is used. Intense confrontation and customizable terrain. --------------------------------------------- All of the above will be there.
